subHeading: We Fight As Hard As You Work
valueProp: Chris Lenzo and Claudia Reis are New Jersey employment attorneys who have successfully represented thousands of employees throughout New Jersey in employment disputes. With almost fifty years of New Jersey employment law experience between them, they handle all types of workplace disputes such as employment discrimination, harassment, retaliation, wage, leave, whistleblower retaliation, equal pay, and accommodation claims. Claudia Reis and Chris Lenzo have recovered millions of dollars for their clients getting them the compensation they deserve when treated illegally at work.
